snippet: Because of a stomach virus, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton suffered a concussion early last week after fainting and striking her head, the State Department said.
abstract: State Department says Secretary of State Hillary Clinton suffered concussion after fainting and striking her head, and will not testify as scheduled before Congressional committees investigating September attack on American diplomatic outpost in Benghazi, Libya.

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI and MICHAEL R. GORDON

lead_paragraph: Because of a stomach virus, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton suffered a concussion early last week after fainting and striking her head, the State Department said.

headline.seo: Hillary Clinton Suffers a Concussion After Fainting
headline.main: Clinton Is Recovering From a Concussion
headline.print_headline: Clinton Is Recovering From a Concussion
